localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Everyone speaks the same language - visual 🌅. So make your backend - visual! Draw your backend architecture, code right in the browser, and execute - all on the same whiteboard. Forget about logs or having to guess what your code does. SEE it in real time 😍
blogPost.body: Everyone speaks the same language - visual 🌅. So make your backend - visual! Draw your backend architecture, code right in the browser, and execute - all on the same whiteboard. Forget about logs or having to guess what your code does. SEE it in real time 😍
blogPost.title: STATEWIZE - Visual software development ecosystem. Draw + Code + Execute
blogPost.author: Lev Perlman

localize.description: 大家都在说同一种语言--可视化🌅。所以，让你的后台--可视化! 在浏览器中画出你的后端架构和代码，并在同一白板上执行。忘记日志或猜测你的代码做什么。实时查看😍
localize.tagline: 可视化软件开发生态系统。绘制+代码+执行

localize.description: 大家都在說同一種語言--可視化🌅。所以，讓你的後臺--可視化! 在瀏覽器中畫出你的後端架構和代碼，並在同一白板上執行。忘記日誌或猜測你的代碼做什麼。實時查看😍
localize.tagline: 可視化軟件開發生態系統。繪製+代碼+執行

previous.excerpt: Did you ever wonder how much you would have earned if you'd invested $1,000 in today’s public companies IPOs?
previous.title: One thousand in - How much would you have if you invested $1000 in an IPO?

localize.description: 你有没有想过，如果你投资1000元在今天的上市公司IPO，你会赚多少钱？
localize.tagline: 如果你在IPO上投资1000元，你会有多少钱？

localize.description: 你有沒有想過，如果你投資1000元在今天的上市公司IPO，你會賺多少錢？
localize.tagline: 如果你在IPO上投資1000元，你會有多少錢？

next.excerpt: Generate a PDF from a URL. Simple, quick and easy. The idea behind this is simple. Don't spend your development time building complicated PDF infrastructure. Let us handle your PDF generation with a simple, asynchronous API.
next.title: PlutoPDF - A URL to PDF converter wrapped behind a simple API.

localize.description: 从一个URL生成一个PDF。简单、快捷、方便。这背后的想法很简单。不要把您的开发时间花在构建复杂的PDF基础架构上。让我们用一个简单的、异步的API来处理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一个包裹在一个简单的API后面的URL到PDF转换器。

localize.description: 從一個URL生成一個PDF。簡單、快捷、方便。這背後的想法很簡單。不要把您的開發時間花在構建複雜的PDF基礎架構上。讓我們用一個簡單的、異步的API來處理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一個包裹在一個簡單的API後面的URL到PDF轉換器。
